channel.title: How to make a .bat MAKE a file after deleting?
channel.description:
Yes, its needed for the server, i need it because after charecter deleting i need to make empty txt files in the char file... is it posible to make it make a file???
i know del /F /S /Q *.
deletes... but what makes it?
